page.title: 10Parbold Hilldale Education
page.content: There is only one school in the Parbold -Hilldale area.It is BISPHAM DURNING'S ENDOWED PRIMARY SCHOOL.80 children are in 3 classes,with 2 full time,1 part time teacher and the Headmaster.75% live in this area.Recent visits to the school were made by P.C.Williamson who came with colleagues and police dogs to give a demonstration,Mr Hampson came to take school photographs,Mr Waplington, presenter of TV's"History Around You", came to talk to 2 classes,Merseyside Young People's Theatre Co came to perform "Drink the Mercury" and Mr D. McKay,a wildlife artist came to give an illustrated talk.The school has buildings of varied age and style.In 1692 Richard Durning,the founder of the school gave $10 for the purchase of a parcel of land and $90 for the erection of the main building including a school yard.
